New Records: Nikola Jokić is the first player in NBA history with 37+ points, 18+ rebounds, and 15+ assists in a game
Jokić’s 10th career game with at least 15 points, rebounds and assists ties him with teammate Russell Westbrook for the second-most all-time behind Oscar Robertson (15)
Jokić’s second career game with 35+ points, 15+ rebounds and 15+ assists tied him with Luka Dončić for the second-most all-time, behind Robertson (5)
During his four-game triple-double streak, Jokić has totaled 118 points, 63 rebounds and 58 assists – no other player in NBA history has hit at least these numbers in ANY four-game span
Key Match Events: Michael Porter Jr. hit the game-winning floater with 6.5 seconds left to lift the Nuggets over the Mavs for their fifth straight win
Nikola Jokić posted a box score never before seen in NBA history
Kyrie Irving (43 pts, 5 reb, 5 ast, 6 3s) joins Luka (23x) as the only players in Mavs history to reach 40+ points, 5+ rebounds, 5+ assists and 5+ 3s in a game
Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers look to be the 8th team to open a season 12-0
The Clippers go for 5th straight victory
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
The coach highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was delayed due to an 11-game Sunday
The Nuggets overcame a 43-point night from Kyrie Irving
The Warriors got 36 points and seven 3s from Steph Curry and used one of their trademark 3rd quarters – outscoring OKC 42-21 to build a 30-point lead
The Kings outscored the Suns 16-7 in overtime to snap Phoenix’s seven-game win streak
The Rockets outscored the Pistons 7-4 in the final three minutes to come away with the win
Jaren Jackson Jr. (20 pts, 7 reb, 3 stl, 3 3s) led seven Grizzlies with at least 12 points as the Grizzlies took the lead for good four minutes and four seconds into the game and never looked back
Others: The Emirates NBA Cup 2024 tips off tomorrow, with the first eight games of Group Play on the first of seven Cup Nights – all games played on Tuesdays and Friday from Nov. 12-Dec. 3 will all count toward the Emirates NBA Cup group standings
